thread.title: Here’s why Jennifer Lawrence couldn’t bag more money for ‘American Hustle’
thread.title_full: Here’s why Jennifer Lawrence couldn’t bag more money for ‘American Hustle’ | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Here’s why Jennifer Lawrence couldn’t bag more money for ‘American Hustle’
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Jennifer Lawrence had recently opened up about the hacked Sony emails, which revealed that she was paid far lesser than her male counterparts in 2013’s ‘American Hustle.’
The 25-year-old actress wrote in Lena Dunham’s newsletter Lenny, revealing that she failed as a negotiator because she gave up early as she didn’t want to keep fighting over millions of dollars that were not needed by her, reports News.com.au.
The Oscar winner added that her compensation seemed fine until she learned what her male co-stars were making.
Lawrence further said that this is an element of her personality, which she has been working against for years, and based on the statistics she does not think that she is a woman of issue.
 14, 2015 8:09 pm
